title: Team to Beat in AFC? Tiger Woods or Tom Brady? Mock Draft 1.0
itunes:title: Team to Beat in AFC? Tiger Woods or Tom Brady? Mock Draft 1.0
description:
The latest edition of The Good Morning Football Podcast explores where the Buffalo Bills rank in the AFC after their monster offseason. Hosts Jane Slater, Peter Schrager, Kyle Brandt, and former Pro Bowler Dante Hall debate which team is the one to beat in the AFC. Then they examine if Josh Allen and Stefon Diggs or Derek Carr and Davante Adams will be a more lethal duo; they discuss if Tom Brady or Tiger Woods has had the more impressive career; and Peter Schrager delivers his mock draft 1.0. They finish up with suggestions for available free agents like Odell Beckham Jr, Calais Campbell, and Stephon Gilmore.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
